name: UZEE'S MAZE v0.1
description:
A poor 3d horror(?) game i made when i was new to unity.

pls don't cancel me i don't actually dislike british ppl.

------HOW TO PLAY------

to play it, you got 5 levels you have to complete. they're mostly goofy and creepy at the same time, after escaping uzeeteevee's maze, you'll be free to go.

y;all can speedrun to it too. try your best.

-------------------------------

tell me in the comment section if unity's ui (such as button, text, others) isn't visible in the game since i also have that problem but fixed it.

THIS GAME MIGHT OR MIGHT NOT BE INSPIRED BY THE GAME "SHREK'S FUNDERLAND". to download it, the link is there:

https://joecapo.itch.io/shrek
